SELECT cartodb_id, ST_AsText(the_geom), field_109 FROM first_60_good
    WHERE cartodb_georef_status = True
    ORDER BY ST_Distance(the_geom, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(-75.97187 40.17333)', ST_Srid(the_geom)))
